name: SASSAFRAS THE GAME
description:
A challenging Game Boy platformer with three levels and good music. Sassafras is a radio show I run with a couple of friends on WREK 91.1 FM. You play as a DJ and the music for the show has been stolen and its up to you to get it back!

This is my first game that I made for a class where we learned how to make game boy games from scratch. 

You will need a GBA emulator to play the game, I recommend Visual Boy Advance. Download: http://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html
